attributes.action: Increase voting access to central and local government elections through secure telephone voting
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We urge you to support this petition to increase participation in the central and local government democratic process by providing secure and reliable voting via the telephone.

Through the ubiquitous telephone, the communication device with which everyone is familiar, a very secure method of remote voting can be delivered to the benefit of the visually impaired; those working away from home and the thousands, especially the young, who find the voting process too restrictive.

We urge your support on the basis that the proposed telephone solution will provide;

1  Convenient access to the UK voting system for all eligible citizens increasing the likelihood that more people would actually vote.
2  A solution where individual voters can be reliably identified and authenticated without the fear of fraud.
3  A more secure, reliable and accessible solution than the existing postal or internet proposals under consideration.
4  Reduced cost of operation to the tax payer – you the voter.
